title: Xayah and Rakan's duo quotes still trigger if one of them is dead.
body:
I love the interactions these 2 have. Absolutely hilarious.

However, I've noticed that their quotes towards each other still trigger when one of them is dead. Do you think there is any way to fix this? Because, it simply makes sense.

replies.body: yea, if one of them is dead it should be a chance for their solo voice lines to trigger.
